segments.text: I'm just taking it all in, this absurd little tableau.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman calmly drying her dishes, oblivious to her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pouring everywhere, forming a lake at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then the children, orchestrating their secret cookie raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is perched so precariously; it's genuinely alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is practically vibrating with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like three different plays happening on one stage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Each character is in their own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between their actions is quite striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who designed this kitchen, to have a cookie jar so high?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It almost feels like a setup for a slapstick comedy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But with real potential for injury and property damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene really makes you think about hidden domestic dramas.
segments.speaker: PAR
